# Summary of submissions and formats.

Show the summary of the submission counts and stakeholder groups for each
inquiry and datasource included in the final data collection.

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("writexl")
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("xtable")
install.packages("ggplot2")
```

# Load and prepare are submission data as extracted from the various inquiries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(writexl)
library(xtable)
library(ggplot2)

monthly_counts <- read_csv('../data/1_counts_data/tweet_counts_monthly.csv')
monthly_counts$year_month = as.Date(
  paste(monthly_counts$year, "-", monthly_counts$month, "-1", sep=""),
  format="%Y-%m-%d"
) 

monthly_counts <- monthly_counts %>% 
  select(year_month, total_tweets, num_not_rt) %>%
  pivot_longer(!year_month, values_to="tweet_count")

ggplot(monthly_counts, aes(x=year_month, y=tweet_count, colour=name)) +
  guides(fill="none") +
  geom_line() + 
  scale_y_continuous(name="Tweet Count") +
  scale_x_date(name="Year") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(color="Counts") +
  scale_color_manual(labels = c("Original Tweets", "All Tweets"), values = c("darkgray", "black"))

```
